                              java.lang.String webCubeCustomImagesLibraryAddress)
        Init builder
        Parameters:
        doxis4Session - Doxis4 Session object
        smtpMailConfig - Name of global value list with configuration of SMTP+IMAP
        doxis4ServerID - Doxis4 server (node) ID - for WIN and MOBILE links
        doxis4WebCubeLink - Doxis4 webCube http address - for WEB link
        mobileCubeHost - Doxis4 mobileCube host - for MOBILE links
        webCubeJSPAddress - Address of webCube JSP pages
        webCubeCustomImagesLibraryAddress - Address of webCube custom images library

        public java.lang.String SendFiles​(TaskNotifcationBuilder.SendMethod sendMethod,
                                  java.util.List<ContentFile> contents,

                                  java.lang.String personName,
                                  java.lang.String responsibleID)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Send notification about task to multiple users (usually at the end of process to all participants)
        Parameters:
        sendMethod - method of sending
        contents - list of files to send
        addresses - List of addresses to send notification
        messageReplacements - Map of Name - Value pairs to be used in messages to replace all occurrences of %Name% to Value
        personName - salutation of email
        responsibleID - ID of person to make decisions
        Returns:
        String message of notification
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if something goes wrong

        showDecisions - show decisions links in notification or not

        descriptors - Map of Name - Value descriptors that must be showed in notification
